story.title: Our Mission
story.subtitle: Italian excellence
story.description: We import and distribute exceptional Italian wines to restaurants, wine merchants and fine grocery stores. Our selection favors independent winemakers and sustainable practices.

team.title: Who We Are
team.subtitle: Our team
team.description: A passionate team with in-depth knowledge of Italian vineyards. We regularly visit our producers and can provide tailored advice.

tasting.title: Tasting
tasting.subtitle: For professionals
tasting.description: We organize professional tastings at our premises or at your place, to help you discover our range and build your wine list.

prices.title: Pricing
prices.subtitle: Request pricing
prices.description: To receive our catalog and professional pricing, contact us. We carefully review each request and offer tailored conditions.
